argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax-5 | |- ( x e. y -> A. z x e. y ) |
| 2 |  | #P_elequ1 | |- ( z = x -> ( z e. y <-> x e. y ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_bj-equsexhv | |- ( E. z ( z = x /\ z e. y ) <-> x e. y ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_bicomi | |- ( x e. y <-> E. z ( z = x /\ z e. y ) ) |
\
 Remove dependency on ~ ax-13 from ~ cleljust .  (Contributed by BJ, 27-Jun-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
